attributes.action: Abolish the Road Tax licence in favour of an increase in  vehicle fuel duty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Collecting of vehicle tax through fuel duty is the ONLY way to stop vehicle licence dodgers.

It will guarantee that everyone that pays for vehicle fuel pays their road tax via the fuel that they use, and, the more you drive the more you pay.

A cheaper system for the treasury whilst a fairer system that helps those that hardly use their cars(elderly, SORN), stops car tax evasion, but also, eliminates the need for police/traffic wardens to check tax discs and the need for post offices to issue tax discs in the first place.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
